DOC.brief_title: Effects Of Native Collagen Type 2 Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: 39 patient diagnosed knee osteoarthritis separate two group . The 1st group include 19 patient give 1500mg/day paracetamol , 2nd group consist 20 patient give 1500mg/day paracetamol 10mg/day native collagen type 2 three months.Pretreatment posttreatment Visual Analog Scale , Western Ontario McMaster Universities Osteoarthritis Index ( WOMAC ) , 20-m walking time Short Form-36 ( SF-36 ) , Coll2-1 , Coll2-1NO2 Fibulin-3 level urine compare .
